Posts.Content: My wife had grade 4 breast cancer 6 years ago, she went through surgery, chemotherapy & radio. Since then she's been in the clear and living life to the full, last week she found another lump, in the other boob and after a swift GP appointment she had been referred back to the breast clinic.Â  We are in shock / nervous about the outcome....has anyone else been through this any advice would be great xx
Posts.Title: We think it's come back

Posts.Content: Hi Maggs, Thank you for your response :) it's defo made me feel more positive about the whole thing. I wish you all the best of luck with Radio & the rest of your treatment :) Liz xx
Posts.Title: We think it's come back
